name: Head In Concrete Mixer
description:
It's prototype. Will be updated after we create first level and remove some bugs.

W to jump

S to crouch / attack(in walk mode)

A to move left

D - to move right

Spacebar - change form

Avaiable forms -

JumpMode(grounded Spacebar) -> WalkMode

JumpMode(midair Spacebar) -> FlyMode

JumpMode(grounded S) -> CrouchMode

You can always go back to jump mode by pressing spacebar.
